title: Ticket #3022: Shared version of libcondorapi
description:
We used to distribute shared and static versions of libcondorapi, which we provide for user applications to read and write Condor user logs. Now, we only distribute a static version. Building and distributing a shared version again would be trivial.

Marco Cecchi is trying to update the WMS software stack in Europe to a recent version of Condor, and they depend on the shared version of libcondorapi.
